Text:
Download my ESET 5 x32 x64 torrent, then download this activator.  Then install ESET boot up in SAFE MODE extract and run this activator.

Reboot your PC normally and ESET should be activated. Run ESET Update.

Those of U having extraction problems:

Download Freearc: http://www.freearc.org/Download.aspx

Then right-click the SFX package and under the freearc sub-menu click on extract and type the name of the folder where you want to extract.
Does not damage the "base filtering engine service"??

I don't think so. This patch "activates" the product. 

I am still using  ESET 4 on my DESKTOP.

I installed ESET 5 on my laptop. 

Personally from my experience you can continue using ESET 4 unless they discontinue support and updates for that product. (I've never had any problems with ESET 4.)
if i uninstall Eset whether windows firewall still work

Had trouble extracting this one..stopped at 52%.
I thought it must be in safe mode.
Went to safe mode and same problem.

Following instructions and getting freearc now (why oh why must make a simple extraction be so troublesome? Aint nothing wrong with winzip or 7zip =)

After extraction, will go back to Safe mode and try again. Report back later on.

Such a simple process. Instantly extracted using freearc. 

And now I hate freearc and this uploader..just because I was needlessly forced for something that should not require such a step.

Nothing personal..just against principle. lol
